product_name: Mountain House Just In Case Essential Freeze-Dried Food Bucket
long_description: The Mountain House Just In Case Essential Freeze-Dried Food Bucket makes it easy to keep a total of 32 per-person servings of food on hand for emergencies or camping.
short_description: The Mountain House Just In Case Essential Freeze-Dried Food Bucket makes it easy to keep a total of 32 per-person servings of food on hand for emergencies or camping.
